data:
{
  "displayRenewals": true,
  "sendErxCreatedDayLimit": 30,
  "displayCancelDURConfirmation": false,
  "warnOnInactiveMedOnRefillRequest": true,
  "performEligibilityUponNewEncounter": true,
  "performEligibilityUponOpeningMedications": false,
  "filterTasksByEnterpriseAndPractice": false,
  "useMetric": false,
  "weightColumn": "wt_lb_graph",
  "metricWeightColumn": "vital_signs_.wt_kg_graph",
  "heightColumn": "ht_in_graph",
  "metricHeightColumn": "vital_signs_.ht_cm_graph",
  "headCircumferenceColumn": "head_circ_in",
  "metricHeadCircumferenceColumn": "vital_signs_.head_circ_cm",
  "temperatureColumn": "vital_signs_.temp_deg_F",
  "systolicBloodPressureColumn": "vital_signs_.bp_systolic",
  "diastolicBloodPressureColumn": "vital_signs_.bp_diastolic",
  "bmiColumn": "vital_signs_.BMI_calc",
  "heartRateColumn": "vital_signs_.pulse_rate",
  "respirationRateColumn": "vital_signs_.respiration_rate",
  "measurementDateColumn": "vitalSignsDate",
  "pulseOximetryRestColumn": "vital_signs_.sp_o2_dtl",
  "pulseOximetryAmbColumn": "vital_signs_.txt_pulse_ox_amb",
  "waistCircumferenceColumn": "vital_signs_.waist_circ_in",
  "hipCircumferenceColumn": "vital_signs_.hip_circ_in",
  "fio2PercentageColumn": "vital_signs_.FiO2",
  "peakFlowColumn": "vital_signs_.peakFlow",
  "epcsAuthenticationMethod": "VIP",
  "_links": [
    {
      "href": "/master/system-options",
      "method": "GET",
      "rel": "self",
      "description": "Returns options that are system-wide, regardless of enterprise, practice, or user.",
      "vendorExtensions": {
        "baseHref": "/master/system-options"
      }
    }
  ]
}
